subject: Re: Talostone - Website Reviews
preview: Hi Tien.  Happy to help!  Feel free to reach out if there are other things we can assist you with.  Have a great day ahead.  Regards, Cindy

full_threads.body:
Hi Tien.

Happy to help!

Feel free to reach out if there are other things we can assist you with.

Have a great day ahead.

Regards,
Cindy

Hi Cindy,

Thank you for all your help on this, much appreciated.
It seems to be all looking good and working now.

Best regards,



Tien

Office Manager

Head Office | Mon - Thu



tien@talostone.com.au



02 8783 0600



talostone.com.au











TALOSTONE® HAVE THREE RANGES
Talostone® Minq® Zero - Mineral Surfaces
Talostone® Artsense® - Sintered Stone
Talostone® Natroccia® - Natural Stone
ORDER SAMPLES
SLAB PURCHASES/ORDER: orders@talostone.com.au

Hi Tien.

I have updated the link in the popup for Talostone Sydney City Experience Centre.

I have copied the links on your Contact Page so let me know if we should also change thte labels and the link on that page.

Regarding mobile issue, I cannot replicate it on my end so for now, I just cleared all the cache.

Can you check if the issue still persist and if possible, can you send me a screenshot of what you are seeing?

Thank you.

Regards,
Cindy

Hi Cindy,

This is the updated wording.

Best regards,



Tien

Hi Cindy,

Thank you so much for the update, it looks great.
Can we please tweak the following labels.
Also when I clicked on the middle tab, it didn't show up our TCEC location, but somewhere in VICTORIA.

On the mobile phone, all three tabs appeared, while on the website, only one appears. Only when you move the mouse, another tab will show up.

Best regards,



Tien

Office Manager

Head Office | Mon - Thu



tien@talostone.com.au



02 8783 0600



talostone.com.au

Talostone® Artsense® - Sintered Stone
Talostone® Natroccia® - Natural Stone

Hi Tien.

I have used the contact page as the link where the popup will trigger when you provide users the QR code.

https://talostone.com.au/contact-us/#leave-us-a-review

Let me know if you prefer another page the popup will appear.

I see that there are changes on the layout of the popup and I assume that you are making the edits.

Let me know if there's anything else I can help you with.

Thank you.

Regards,
Cindy

Hi Tien.

Update requests completed.

I have duplicated the warranty popup and updated the content for the Leave Us A Review popup.

Please also have this pop up as individual link so that we can use to create QR.
Regarding the request above: since the trigger is tied to a footer menu click, displaying a popup QR code isn’t feasible. However, we can add a parameter to an existing page like the contact page—this would allow you to generate a QR code for it. I am just currently trying to figure out how we can trigger the popup on page load once it is from the QR code link.

I'll keep you updated. Thanks.

regards,
Cindy

Hi Cindy,

This is correct - Talostone Victoria Distribution Hub doesn't have a review link yet, please crate one for them.

Also regarding the below "Leave Us A Review"
Can you please change a few things.
After seeing it, we would like it to follow through with similar to our other features on the website.
For this link, can you please amend so that when clicking in the "Leave Us A Review" a pop up comes out, same as the one here: https://talostone.com.au/health-and-safety-technical-data
Please apply same feature for the same pop up comes out.
Please also have this pop up as individual link so that we can use to create QR.

Please let me know if it makes sense, I'm available for a phone discussion if required.

Best regards,



Tien

Office Manager

Head Office | Mon - Thu



tien@talostone.com.au



02 8783 0600



talostone.com.au

Talostone® Natroccia® - Natural Stone

(Time: 35mins)

Hi Allan.

I have sent the invite to both emails to your Google Business Profile:
  • info@talostone.com.au 
  • allan@talostone.com.au

Once you've accepted the invites, you will be able to receive notifications.

I have added the following locations on the footer as well.

I am just unsure of the link that I added on the Talostone Victoria but I just copied it from the contact form page and it doesn't have a review yet.

Kindly confirm and let me know if this needs to be changed.

Regards,
Cindy

G-809819

Regards,



Allan

Please let me know if the invite has been sent so we can get started.

Thank you!

Regards,
Cindy

Hi Cindy,

Thank you for your email.

Hello Tien!

Looks like we don't have access in your Google Business Profile yet to make the change requests for email notification once reviews are submitted. Can you please add team@smartreviews.com.au?

Just to clarify as well, we will be adding submenus under Leave us a review link in the footer that displays the three locations with their respective review link.

Thank you.
@cindy - just checked. We don't have access to their GBP yet:
@daphne can you check if the site is in our smart reviews or we have access on their Google Business Profile? Will set up the footer links once confirmed. Thank you.
@cindy need help with this ticket as well. Thanks!

Hi team,

Can you please let me know if this is possible to create.
We would like to create a google review link for three different Talostone locations.
Once the link clicked, it has options for the reviewer to select which location (Head Office & Warehouse - NSW, City Experience Centre - Sydney, or Distribution & Showroom - VIC). https://talostone.com.au/contact-us

Please replace current "Leave us a review" link to open to three different locations for individual reviews of individual locations.
Also, can the review be alerted to these two emails info@talostone.com.au and allan@talostone.com.au


Best regards,

Tien

Office Manager
